comments.body:
Could we also log the error to help users debug/give us diagnostic information in the event of failures? e.g.
```logger.error("Unable to load HTML artifact, got error " + this.state.error")```?

Do you expect me to print the error on the web console?
`console.error("Unable to load HTML artifact, got error " + this.state.error);`
I have copy the fetchArtifacts() function from the ShowArtifactTextView.js file. I currently can't see where an error is being set.
I add a catch() method to set the error in a error case
This should also be added to the ShowArtifactTextView.js. Should I open a new pull request for this ?

Yep, a separate PR for this in ShowArtifactTextView.js makes sense - ideally in that separate Pr, we could pull `fetchArtifacts` out into a utility so we don't need to copy the implementation across components :)
